accept_neutral: t_c thanks you for your gift.
accept_dislike: t_c takes your gift with a frown.
already_have: t_c thanks you, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} already {VERB/t_c/have/has} the accessory you've given {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.
accept_favourite: t_c is overjoyed at your gift!

accept_like: t_c nods and accepts your gift, commending your good taste.
accept_neutral: t_c isn't sure what to do with this, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} can take it off your paws.
accept_dislike: t_c takes the gift, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/don't/doesn't} look too happy about it...
already_have: t_c wonders why you think {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'d need two of the same thing.
accept_favourite: t_c accepts your gift, trying poorly to hide the excitement in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} eyes.

accept_neutral: t_c accepts your gift (y_g) with a polite thank you.
